text: Allyson Schwartz (n√©e Young; born October 3, 1948) is an American Democratic Party politician. She was a member of the United States House of Representatives from 2005 to 2015. She unsuccessfully ran for the U.S. Senate in 2000 and for Governor of Pennsylvania in 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Pennsylvania Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Allyson Schwartz
